contents.text: Welcome to AppNexus, the New York-based advertising marketplace connecting leading publishers and brands.
To reach your account manager, press 1.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to your account manager; a representative will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Discuss a recent billing discrepancy with my account manager
Discuss adjusting my revenue share and optimizing ad placements for my veteran-focused blog with an account manager
Connect me with my account manager to review and optimize my publisher rate floors and yield strategies
I need to speak with my account manager about reviewing my publisher billing statement
Review my publisher revenue report and address a billing discrepancy with my account manager

contents.text: Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to technical support; a specialist will assist you shortly.

navigationGoals: Get help resolving ad-serving errors on my site
Get help resolving ad loading errors on my website so my ads display correctly
Get technical support for troubleshooting ad tag latency and debugging our Prebid.js integration
I’m having trouble logging into my publisher dashboard and need technical help
Troubleshoot a header bidding integration error on my publisher site with technical support

contents.text: To speak with our sales team, press 1.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to our sales team; a representative will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Obtain pricing and set up a new ad package with sales
Find out pricing and options for a targeted ad campaign promoting my veteran-run e-commerce store
Speak with sales to get pricing and package details for launching a new DSP campaign
I want to discuss advertising package options and pricing for my small local business
Discuss programmatic advertising pricing tiers and volume discounts with a sales representative

contents.text: For platform onboarding and training, press 2.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you with our onboarding specialists; someone will assist you shortly.

navigationGoals: Schedule a platform onboarding session for my team
Receive guidance on setting up my first ad campaign and navigating the platform dashboard
Arrange an onboarding session to train my team on AppNexus API usage and platform workflows
I’d like a guided walkthrough of the ad platform to learn how to set up campaigns
Arrange an onboarding session to learn how to optimize campaigns on the AppNexus platform
